KernelGatewayImageConfig.description: The configuration for the file system and kernels in a SageMaker image running as a KernelGateway app.

properties.name: FileSystemConfig
properties.description: The Amazon Elastic File System (EFS) storage configuration for a SageMaker image.

type.description: The Amazon Elastic File System (EFS) storage configuration for a SageMaker image.

properties.name: KernelSpecs
properties.description: The specification of the Jupyter kernels in the image.

type.description: The specification of the Jupyter kernels in the image.

FileSystemConfig.description: The Amazon Elastic File System (EFS) storage configuration for a SageMaker image.

properties.name: DefaultGid
properties.description: The default POSIX group ID (GID). If not specified, defaults to 100.

type.description: The default POSIX group ID (GID). If not specified, defaults to 100.

properties.name: DefaultUid
properties.description: The default POSIX user ID (UID). If not specified, defaults to 1000.

type.description: The default POSIX user ID (UID). If not specified, defaults to 1000.

properties.name: MountPath
properties.description: The path within the image to mount the user's EFS home directory. The directory should be empty. If not specified, defaults to /home/sagemaker-user.

type.description: The path within the image to mount the user's EFS home directory. The directory should be empty. If not specified, defaults to /home/sagemaker-user.

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: The display name of the kernel.

type.description: The display name of the kernel.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of tags to apply to the AppImageConfig.

type.description: A list of tags to apply to the AppImageConfig.

properties.name: AppImageConfigArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppImageConfig.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AppImageConfig.
